      • teleport

        public void teleport(net.minecraft.world.World worldIn,
            net.minecraft.util.BlockPos pos)
        Teleports all Entities in the range of the pillar into the other dimension using a AncientPowerTeleporter object.
        Parameters:
        worldIn - The world object.
        pos - The position of the block.
        See Also:
        AncientPowerTeleporter

      • getBottomofPillar

                                            net.minecraft.util.BlockPos pos)
        Finds the bottom block of the pillar
        Parameters:
        worldIn - The world object.
        pos - The starting position
        Returns:
        The position of the bottom pillar, null, when the pillar is incomplete.

        public int getMetaFromState(net.minecraft.block.state.IBlockState state)
